column4: has anyone upgraded the to the newest 2.6.20.16 kernel?  I have been on the forums and it seems that there are a few people that have had issues with the upgrade..
Where any of the problems *not* related to proprietary Nvidia / ATI drivers ?
You shouldn't have a problem as long as you used the restricted driver manager instead of installing from ati.com

thanks for the advise.  I have a few updates, the new ubuntu kernel, headers-generic, image-generic, also a low latency kernel, and restricted modules-generic.  Which order of download would be safest?
